name: navigate_up
description: Navigate back to the previous screen.

name: save_event
description: Save the event with the provided details.
parameters: {'title': 'What is the title of the event?', 'location': 'Where is the event located?', 'description': 'What is the description of the event?', 'all_day': 'Is the event an all-day event? [true, false]', 'start_date': 'What is the start date of the event?', 'start_time': 'What is the start time of the event?', 'end_date': 'What is the end date of the event?', 'end_time': 'What is the end time of the event?', 'reminder_1': 'When should the first reminder be set?', 'reminder_2': 'When should the second reminder be set?'}

name: set_event_title
description: Set the title of the event.
parameters: {'title': 'What is the title of the event?'}

name: set_event_location
description: Set the location of the event.

name: show_event_on_map
description: Show the event location on the map.

name: set_event_description
description: Set the description of the event.
parameters: {'description': 'What is the description of the event?'}

name: toggle_all_day_event
parameters: {'all_day': 'Is the event an all-day event? [true, false]'}

name: set_event_start_date
description: Set the start date of the event.
parameters: {'start_date': 'What is the start date of the event?'}

name: set_event_start_time
description: Set the start time of the event.
parameters: {'start_time': 'What is the start time of the event?'}

name: set_event_end_date
description: Set the end date of the event.
parameters: {'end_date': 'What is the end date of the event?'}

name: set_event_end_time
description: Set the end time of the event.
parameters: {'end_time': 'What is the end time of the event?'}

name: set_event_reminder_1
description: Set the first reminder for the event.
parameters: {'reminder_1': 'When should the first reminder be set?'}

name: add_another_reminder
description: Add another reminder for the event.
parameters: {'reminder_2': 'When should the second reminder be set?'}
